advancements.uusi-aurinko.dark_new_sun.d: Make the new sun turn dark
advancements.uusi-aurinko.full_new_sun.d: Make the fullest golden new sun rise up in the Overworld
advancements.uusi-aurinko.grow_new_sun.d: Give the new sun enough sacrifice
advancements.uusi-aurinko.rise_dark_new_: Make the dark new sun rise up in the End
advancements.uusi-aurinko.root.descripti: The way to glory and destruction
advancements.uusi-aurinko.root.title: Uusi Aurinko
config.uusi-aurinko.change_fluid_renderi: The rendering effect of fluid blocks is changed. Press F3+T to take effect.
death.attack.uusi-aurinko.electricity: %1$s experienced high voltage pass through the body
death.attack.uusi-aurinko.electricity.pl: %1$s experienced high voltage pass through the body whilst fighting %2$s
death.attack.uusi-aurinko.sun_blaze: %1$s was burnt into ash by the blaze the new sun
death.attack.uusi-aurinko.sun_blaze.play: %1$s was burnt into ash by the blaze of the new sun whilst fighting %2$s
death.attack.uusi-aurinko.sun_fusion: %1$s experienced the nuclear fusion energy inside the new sun
death.attack.uusi-aurinko.sun_fusion.pla: %1$s experienced the nuclear fusion energy inside the new sun whilst fighting %2$s
item.uusi-aurinko.earth_stone.tooltip:
It looks like it could stand the test of aeons.
It quickly turns everything around into soil; with only a slight swing it can make earth collapse.
item.uusi-aurinko.evil_eye.tooltip:
This eye-shaped artefact projects a malevolent glare.
Put it on your forehead, it then reveals everything to you.
Exhausting to you is its intense gaze.
item.uusi-aurinko.fire_stone.tooltip:
This tiny rock looks most fiery, but when touched only a pleasant warmth can be felt.
Seem to provide fire protection when held in hand, but be careful with your flammable furniture!
item.uusi-aurinko.lightning_stone.toolti:
This small rock makes you feel very charged.
Holding it can makes you survive from electric shock. Do not throw it away near conductors.
item.uusi-aurinko.moon.tooltip:
WIP
This tiny celestial object has a strong gravitational pull.
It attracts everything, especially other stars.
item.uusi-aurinko.poop_stone.tooltip:
This mysterious spiral-shaped artefact smells horrible and feels warm to the touch.
Disgusting...
item.uusi-aurinko.sun_seed.tooltip:
It glows, full of promise.
Dust and dirt around burst into pieces quickly under its tremendous heat.
item.uusi-aurinko.sun_stone.tooltip:
The essence of the Sun, crystallized.
Dust and dirt around are burnt down within seconds.
item.uusi-aurinko.water_stone.tooltip:
This small rock is hard and solid, yet seems to be gushing with water.
It is wet enough to damage fire-sensitive creatures, extinguish fire on body and solidify lava temporary.
It even makes you breath under water!
